description: This Dart file defines the JobsProvider class, which manages fetching job data, applying to jobs, and notifying listeners in a Flutter application. It handles API interactions related to jobs and maintains state for loading and error conditions.

classes.name: JobsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages loading, searching, and applying for jobs, fetching data from an API, and notifying the UI of state changes.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Fetches the list of jobs from the API and updates the local state.

methods.name: applyToJob
methods.description: Submits an application for a specific job by its ID and optionally refreshes the jobs list.
